category-def.name: PREESM
category-def.label: PREESM
category-def.description: PREESM (the Parallel and Real-time Embedded Executives Scheduling Method) is an open source rapid prototyping and code generation tool. It is primarily employed to simulate signal processing applications and generate code for multi-core Digital Signal Processors. PREESM is developed at the Institute of Electronics and Telecommunications-Rennes (IETR) in collaboration with Texas Instruments France in Nice.
